name: coding-guide-helper
description: C language coding guide checker and formatter

codingGuideHelper.serverPath.description: Path to the coding-guide-helper-lsp executable. If empty, will try to find it automatically.

codingGuideHelper.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run build:lsp && npm run compile
scripts.build:lsp: cd ../.. && cargo build --release --package coding-guide-helper-lsp && cd editors/vscode && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');fs.mkdirSync('bin',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync('../../target/release/coding-guide-helper-lsp.exe','bin/coding-guide-helper-lsp.exe')"
